dict.acceptation: 第一，首先（主要用于列举条目、论点时）；

sent.orig: A mathematical model about the duration of seal testhydrostatic test for gas pipeline was developed firstly.
sent.trans: 建立了考虑管道弹性变形和含有一定量气体时输气管道严密性水试压稳压时间计算的数学模型。

sent.orig: Firstly, this thesis built a Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) of the leaving of first-line employee.
sent.trans: 针对中原乙烯生产一线雇员流失问题，本文首先建立了结构雇员流失结构方程模型。

sent.orig: It is IBM appoints new presiding apparitor formally firstly.
sent.trans: 其一是IBM正式任命新的首席执行官。

sent.orig: This paper analyzes firstly risk factors of PPP projects and then propose a risk allocation mechanism.
sent.trans: 分析了PPP项目的风险因素以及风险承担机制，使公共部门在PPP项目建设的前期建立更行之有效的风险承担框架。

sent.orig: SINA gene was firstly identified in Drosophila.
sent.trans: SINA基因最初是在果蝇中克隆到。
